## rotateRect() function

Calculate the rect after rotated the container

**Signature:**

```typescript
export function rotateRect(
  containerSize: Size,
  rect: Rect,
  rotation: Rotation
): Rect;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type                             | Description       |
| ------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------------- |
| containerSize | [Size](./models.size.md)         | size of container |
| rect          | [Rect](./models.rect.md)         | target rect       |
| rotation      | [Rotation](./models.rotation.md) | rotation angle    |

**Returns:**

[Rect](./models.rect.md)

rotated rect
